epic and scary

Game's a shit show, Don't ever expect it to be balanced or even remotely stable. But the fun isn't from this being a fine tuned piece of gaming. The fun is in the choices and plays you make, the builds you create to terrorize your opponents or undermine the killer. There's going to be whole libraries you could write about the flaws in this game that still haunt it from beta, And you'll keep playing. Because you had a bad run of luck, or there's builds you want to make, hopefully you're like me and just want to become better at what you do in the game. Each match can either be a steamroll session, or a by the skin of your teeth adventure the likes of which would Harrison Ford's career look boring. There's been enough releases so that there's a killer/survivor for just about every aesthetic you could imagine....except Africans for some reason?

Either way, buy the game, you'll hate it, but it's still fun.

游戏已经没有以前的心意了，无限重复的机制和任务。并且有很多三观素质都很低下的玩家。建议萌新不要入坑。国人的鹅厂心态已经带入到这个游戏了。没必要玩个游戏肝到死出来还要嘲讽。五周年可是还能走多远？游戏环境低下。游戏素质下降。游戏内容完全重复。玩起来累死还不如玩玩主机。在此也忠告一些朋友。国内游戏的游戏素质就别带出国门丢人现眼了。小日本鬼子都比你们有素质，实实在在瞧不起你们这群瘪三

dis game is amizing

Being a survivor in this game is only fun when your playing with friends or your toxic using Borrowed time, unbreakable, dead hard, iron will and that's at least 80% of the time most survivors are using it.

Being a killer is terrible because all you get when you load into a game is 4 people in a team all using perks like borrowed time, dead hard, unbreakable, iron will and it is literally impossible to do anything about it. If you tunnel people they just do all the gens if you hook camp they just activate borrowed time and get away or they body block you when you try put someone on a hook when you get close to hitting them they just dead hard away and if they use unbreakable they just get up off the floor when you chase someone else and when they open the gate they just tea bag you then say your bad when your not you just cant beat 4 toxic people with broken perks on 

matchmaking isnt fair because there is just sweats that do 360s and stop you hitting them or they just constantly run around something vaulting windows flash lighting you pallet dropping 

TBH it can be fun you just need to play with people 

if you rage easily i wouldnt play this game its so toxic and perks need nerfing

This game is the single most fun and awful thing iv ever played. One match can be a shining example of the love the community has for this incredibly in depth game. The next can instantly be a firey train wreck of tunnelling, camping, tea bagging and abuse that makes you want to sue for a refund. Buy this game for fun with friends. Dont buy this game.
